sentences.en: Credit rating could do with more competition, and a bit more rigour.
sentences.cn: 信用评级需要更多的竞争, 还要更严格一点.

sentences.en: His formulation is gravely lacking in mathematical rigour.
sentences.cn: 他的公式严重缺乏数学上的严密性.

sentences.en: Hitherto Barchester had escaped the taint of any extreme rigour of church doctrine.
sentences.cn: 顶到这时候为止,巴彻斯特一直逃脱了任何极端严厉的教条的污染.

sentences.en: Our derivation lacks rigour in this regard.
sentences.cn: 我们的推导在这方面是不严格的.

sentences.en: Part of our difficulty is a lack of rigour in Earth science.
sentences.cn: 我们的部分困难来自于地球科学中缺乏的严格性.

sentences.en: Part of our difficulty is a lack of rigour in Earth sciences.
sentences.cn: 我们困难的一部分是在地球科学中缺乏严格性.

sentences.en: Rigour has a crucial part to play in clarification.
sentences.cn: 严密性对于数学的净化起着决定性的作用.

sentences.en: Rigour is the concern of philosophy and not of geometry.
sentences.cn: 严密为哲学而不为几何学所关心.

sentences.en: The academic rigour of his lectures is fortunately tempered with wit.
sentences.cn: 幸好他的讲座学术上严谨,语言上妙趣横生.

sentences.en: The crime will be treated with the full rigour of the law.
sentences.cn: 这一罪行会严格依法审理.

sentences.en: The new current affairs series promises to address challenging issues with freshness and rigour.
sentences.cn: 新的时事系列节目承诺以全新的视角和严谨的态度谈论有挑战性的问题。

sentences.en: The new sheriff decided to enforce the law with rigour.
The prince had performed his social duties with professional rigour.
sentences.cn: 王子以职业性的严谨履行了他的社会职责。
他们的分析缺乏严谨性.

sentences.en: Their research is characterised by originality, academic rigour and practical relevance.
sentences.cn: 其研究的特点是原创性, 学术严谨和现实针对性.

sentences.en: Their research seems to me to be lacking in rigour.
sentences.cn: 他们的研究在我看来不够严谨。

sentences.en: We now sketch, without any pretence at rigour, how this may be done.
sentences.cn: 现在我们就概略地叙述一下如何能够做到这一点, 而不试图严格地给予论证.
